text: Can someone help?   ln: /usr/bin/subl: Operation not permitted  I get this message ^^ when I try to perform the command below.  sudo ln -s /Applications/Sublime\ Text.app/Contents/SharedSupport/bin/subl /usr/bin/subl  this is what I get when run echo $PATH /usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin

author: @siqiliu3019
text: For mac  sudo ln -s /Applications/Sublime\ Text\ 2.app/Contents/SharedSupport/bin/subl /usr/local/bin/subl works

author: @ChintsVadgama
text: For mac enter this command into terminal:  ln -s "/Applications/Sublime Text 2.app/Contents/SharedSupport/bin/subl" ~/.rvm/bin/subl

author: @dylangeorge10
text: Mac users may have to type 'sudo' before the last entry, so use:  sudo ls -la /usr/local/bin/ | grep subl
